content.rendered:
Copyright

Copyright © 2009-2022 Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp., a subsidiary of Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, N.J., U.S.A. All rights reserved.

Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp. hereby authorizes you to copy materials published on this Web site for personal, non-commercial use only, provided any copy of these materials which you make, shall retain all copyright and other proprietary notices contained herein. These materials cannot otherwise be copied, distributed, displayed, modified, posted on a Web site, or transmitted or used for any public or commercial purpose without prior permission of Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp.

Each Merck and non-Merck site to which this site links remains subject to its own copyright notice

The above authorization does not apply to the following publications posted on this Web site: THE MERCK MANUAL OF MEDICAL INFORMATION—HOME EDITION, THE MERCK MANUAL OF HEALTH & AGING, THE MERCK MANUAL OF GERIATRICS and THE MERCK MANUAL OF DIAGNOSIS AND THERAPY.

Permission to use any portions of these publications in any manner including posting any portions on a Web site must be obtained by contacting the Merck National Service Center at 1-800-672-6372.

Trademarks

All product names appearing on this Web site are trademarks owned by or licensed to Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp., its subsidiaries or affiliates unless otherwise noted.

Nothing contained herein shall be construed as conferring by implication, estoppel or otherwise, any license or right under any patent or trademark of Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp. or any third party. Except as expressly provided above, nothing contained herein shall be construed as conferring any license or right under any copyright of Merck Sharp & Dohme Corp.
